members.title: fix(agents): suppress tool error warnings when assistant already replied

Reorders the shouldShowToolErrorWarning check to respect hasUserFacingReply, adds a guard to prevent emitting error payloads for verbose tool output, and updates tests to cover both scenarios (with and without a user-facing reply). Tests cover unit and end-to-end behavior, and the change is thoroughly validated (pnpm build/check/test) with broad coverage across impacted areas. Overall strong code quality and thoroughness.

members.author: gatewaybuddy

While tests were added and some improvements implemented, the underlying strategy is flawed and could suppress important warnings (e.g., git, sed, docker, etc.). The change introduces significant maintainability and correctness concerns despite some coverage.
